snippet.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed | Announce Trailer | US | ESRB
snippet.description:
New trailer alert! Get ready for an awesome new adventure with your favourite heroes in a half shell! Teenage Mutants Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed is gearing up to unleash an epic wave of action on PC and consoles on 18th October 2024!

Embark on an pizza-fueled journey with Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello and Michelangelo to battle an all-new wave of havoc-wreaking mutants as you join forces with familiar faces in thrilling missions across the streets of NYC!

Find out more about the game here: https://outrightgames.com/us/games/teenage-mutant-ninja-turtles-mutants-unleashed/

✨ Stay updated on our socials:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/outright_games/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@outrightgames
